attributes.action: Give nurses the same 2.8% pay rise as doctors-COVID 19
attributes.additional_details:
Nurses are the backbone of our NHS and deserve to be recognised as such.
The face that Doctors are receiving a 2.8% pay rise due to the Covid-19 pandemic and nurses are set to receive 0% increase in their pay is absolutely abhorrent and the decision needs to be reviewed immediately.
attributes.background: All Nurses to receive the same increase in pay as doctors.
